mapper.select: select CODE_FIRST as codeFirst, CODE_SECOND as codeSecond, CODE_NO as codeNo, CODE_HNAME as codeHname, CODE_KITA1 as codeKita1, CODE_KITA2 as codeKita2, CODE_KITA3 as codeKita3, CODE_KITA4 as codeKita4, CODE_KITA5 as codeKita5, CODE_USEYN as codeUseyn, SORT_ORDER as sortOrder from ca_cmm_cd where 1=1 and CODE_FIRST = #{codeFirst} and CODE_SECOND = #{codeSecond} ;

select CODE_FIRST as codeFirst, CODE_SECOND as codeSecond, CODE_NO as codeNo, CODE_HNAME as codeHname, CODE_KITA1 as codeKita1, CODE_KITA2 as codeKita2, CODE_KITA3 as codeKita3, CODE_KITA4 as codeKita4, CODE_KITA5 as codeKita5, CODE_USEYN as codeUseyn, SORT_ORDER as sortOrder from ca_cmm_cd where 1=1 and CODE_NO = #{codeNo} ;
